text: so the right of that is the hospital so
in the ER literally is right behind that
fire right there by about 20 feet so I
hope they have someone over there
putting that out 11 o'clock if somebody
came around honking their horn like just
crazy it was just like what is going on
and I don't know what inspired me to
look out my bedroom window because it's
in the back of the house and the car was
in the front of the house but I drew my
blinds and I just saw flames all up on
the hill behind my house so of course I
panicked and still shaking went out and
they were screaming fire fire fire get
out get out so that's what I called my
neighbors we're all together
and we all just got in their cars and
left I've got my cat in the car over
there and that's about it
